descriptionHtml:
This is a very small mod that gets rid of the shaky screen when you are near a mammoth. A couple months ago, I was making a small mammoth follower mod and came across the problem of having the shaky screen whenever it was near me. After a few hours of digging up stuff around the internet and a little help from an experienced mod maker, I found out how to fix this problem which was editing the animation files for mammoths.

This is probably not a big deal to most people but I thought that about my other small tweaks and mods which got way more downloads than I thought so I figured I'd share this. I find it sort of unrealistic that mammoths cause what appears to be a severe earthquake whenever you are near them so this could be considered an immersion mod. Anyways, thanks for listening.

Credits to Fore for the help in making this mod.Â
author: drbeavis
